column1: The Purple Pig////As Californians visiting the city
column2: my friends and I were told to try The Purple Pig. Our meal here was one of the best during our stay in Chicago. We had a group of 6 and we all loved to eat tapas-style. With so many great options and us wanting to order a lot
column3: the staff let us mark up the menu. Fun Fact: The Purple Pig changes their menu twice a day
